price: 66. Rabbiga samooyinka iyo arlada iyo waxa u dhexeeya, Adkaadaha Sare, Denbi Dhaafka Badan.
arabic: رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡغَفَّٰرُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā al-ʿazīzu al-ghafāru
